description:
Deep in the jungle, Excel is held captive by a small army of soldiers.  Il Palazzo sends Hyatt to deal with the situation - and she fails completely. But the guerillas have a bigger problem: Nabeshin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El chivo expiatorio de la gran huida hostil del infierno
Jigoku no Dokudoku Daidassou no Ikenie
L`agneau sacrificiel de la grande évasion venimeuse de l`Enfer
The Sacrificial Lamb of the Venomous Great Escape of Hell
地獄の毒々大脱走のいけにえ
